snippet.title: The 10 highest-paying jobs that don't require a bachelor's degree
snippet.content:
You don't need a four-year degree to pursue a high-paying job.
According to the latest , there are plenty of jobs that pay more than $US77,000 and require only a two-year associate degree, postsecondary nondegree certificate, or even just a high-school diploma.
Below are the 10 highest-paying jobs that you can get without a bachelor's degree. You can .
